## Course Materials
### Lecture Sessions

Lecture I. **Introduction to the course** - Slide Links: *will be posted 06/22/2022* [ES](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Q4EfOdMmATJr1qH5C2riH3g5SCA192wK/view?usp=sharing), [EN]()  

  * Instructors
  * Participants
  * Course Goals  
  

Lecture II. **Costa Rica coral restoration** - Slide Links *will be posted 06/22/2022* [ES](), [EN]()  

  * [Raising Coral Costa Rica](https://www.raisingcoral.org/)
  * [Culebra Reef Gardens](https://culebrareefgardens.org/home/)
  * *Pocillopora* samples to be analyzed during the workshop  
  

Lecture III. **Fundamentals of genetics and evolution** - Slide Links *will be posted 06/22/2022* [ES](), [EN]()  

  * DNA structure and chromosomal organization
  * Mendelian inheritance
  * Evolution by natural selection
  * Molecular methods in genetics
	 - DNA extraction
	 - Polymerase chain reaction
	 - Gel electrophoresis
	 - Restriction fragment length polymorphism  
	 

Lecture IV. **Introduction to conservation genetics and species delimitation** - Slide Links *will be posted 06/22/2022* [ES](), [EN]()  

  * Extinction
  * Genetic diversity 
  * Importance of species delimitation and taxonomy
  * Measuring genetic diversity - mtDNA, microsatellites, SNPs, whole genomes  
  

Lecture V. **Eastern Pacific coral diversity**

  * Families
      + *Carophyllia*
      + *Fungia*
      + *Gardinoseris*
      + *Leptoseris*
      + *Pavona*
      + *Pocillopora*
      + *Porites*
      + *Psammocora*
      + *Tubastrea*

Lecture VI. **Coral-algae symbiosis in the eastern tropical Pacific**


Lecture VII. **Coral biodiversity research at the Smithsonian: STRI field research and NMNH historical collections** - Slide Links *will be posted 06/22/2022* [ES](), [EN]()  

  * Anthozoan evolution, coral diversity and morphology-based taxonomy
  * Coral extinctions and current trajectories

Lecture VIII. **Conservation genetics for coral restoration** - Slide Links *will be posted 06/22/2022* [ES](), [EN]()  


Lecture IX. **Genomics and high-throughput sequencing in conservation biology** - Slide Links *will be posted 06/22/2022* [ES](), [EN]()
